title: Clutch CLI
name: clutch-cli
description: Command line tool for Clutch, a modern headless CMS scaffold for Prismic and Contentful.

scripts.test: rm -rf test ; mkdir test ; cd test ; node ../clutch.js init
scripts.test:global: rm -rf test ; mkdir test ; cd test ; clutch init
scripts.test:source: rm -rf test ; mkdir test ; cd test ; node ../clutch.js source
